name: portfolio
description: this is portfolio app using create-single-spa

scripts.start1: concurrently "cd packages/portfolio-container && yarn start" "cd packages/portfolio-main && yarn start" "cd packages/react-mini-apps && yarn start"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd packages/portfolio-container && yarn start" "cd packages/portfolio-main && yarn start" "cd packages/react-mini-apps && yarn start"  "cd packages/vue-mini-apps && yarn serve"
scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd packages/portfolio-container && yarn install" "cd packages/portfolio-main && yarn install" "cd packages/react-mini-apps && yarn install"  "cd packages/vue-mini-apps && yarn install"

author: bugg-m <mkchauhan0543@gmail.com>
